section.heading: Records and data available; additional surveys.
section.text: The National Capital Planning Commission and the Highway Planning Survey Unit shall make available such records and factual data and make such additional surveys as the Mayor may deem necessary to carry out the purposes of this subchapter.

annotations.annotation: Motor Vehicle Parking Agency abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-2604.
D.C. Law 16-175 deleted “or the Agency” following “Mayor”.
